sourcesContent:
/*! ========================================================= * Black Dashboard React v1.0.0 ========================================================= * Product Page: https://www.creative-tim.com/product/black-dashboard-react * Copyright 2019 Creative Tim (https://www.creative-tim.com) * Licensed under MIT (https://github.com/creativetimofficial/black-dashboard-react/blob/master/LICENSE.md) * Coded by Creative Tim ========================================================= * The above copyright notice and this permission notice shall be included in all copies or substantial portions of the Software. */ import React from "react"; // nodejs library that concatenates classes import classNames from "classnames"; import Web3 from 'web3'; // reactstrap components import { Button, ButtonGroup, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, CardTitle, Row, Col, FormGroup, Input } from "reactstrap"; let web3 = ""; class Dashboard extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { bigChartData: "data1", coinbase: "", balance: "0,00" }; } componentDidMount() { if (window.ethereum) { web3 = new Web3(window.ethereum); try { window.ethereum.enable().then(console.log("connected")) } catch(e) { console.log("acces denied") } } // Legacy DApp Browsers else if (window.web3) { web3 = new Web3(window.web3.currentProvider); } // Non-DApp Browsers else { alert('Please install MetaMask !'); } //Get coinbase and balance web3.eth.getCoinbase().then(result => web3.eth.getBalance(result).then( result => (this.setState({balance: (result/10**16).toLocaleString(undefined, {maximumFractionDigits:2})}))) ) } setBgChartData = name => { this.setState({ bigChartData: name }); }; render() { console.log(this.state.balance); return ( <>
Balance USD
{" "} {this.state.balance}
Balance LUSD: 0,00
Balance EURO
{" "} 0,00
Balance LEURO: 0,00
Balance GOLD
{" "} 0,00
Balance LGOLD: 0,00
Transfer
{" "} USD Receiver amount
); } } export default Dashboard;
